title: Going Under
description: This edition is no longer available.Evan moved into his remote country house with all the excitement and promise of a new start. He thought he'd found it until the strange noises beganâ€¦ When the attacks became physical, Evan was left bruised and battered and desperate for help.When Evan Griffin walks into the offices of paranormal investigators, Knight & Stone, Ross Stone is dumbfounded by the injuries the man bears. Injuries Evan insists were caused by an unseen assailant in his own home. Something in the man's eyes pulls at Ross's heartstrings. But dare Ross risk getting close to Evan when he is fighting his own demons?CONTENT ADVISORY: This title contains moderate violence and gore.
author: Lisa Worrall
